hero.subtitle: LARES AISLACIONES
hero.title: Experts in thermal insulation and waterproofing
hero.description: We specialize in thermal insulation with polyurethane foam and waterproofing with polyurea in Barcelona. We energetically rehabilitate your spaces with the best solutions on the market.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer comprehensive thermal insulation and waterproofing solutions, both for rehabilitation of existing buildings and for new constructions.

thermalInsulation.title: Thermal Insulation
thermalInsulation.description: We apply polyurethane foam for optimal thermal insulation, reducing energy consumption and providing comfort.

waterproofing.title: Waterproofing
waterproofing.description: Waterproofing services with polyurea, ensuring long-lasting protection against moisture and leaks.

energyRehabilitation.title: Energy Rehabilitation
energyRehabilitation.description: We recondition previous work or intervene in new projects to optimize the energy efficiency of buildings.

customProjects.title: Custom Projects
customProjects.description: We design personalized solutions adapted to the specific needs of each client and project.

polyurethaneAdvantages: High insulating power with minimum thickness
Continuous insulation without joints or thermal bridges
Great durability and resistance to humidity
polyureaAdvantages: Excellent adhesion to almost any surface

about.title: Meet Our Team
description: At Lares Aislaciones, we pride ourselves on having a team of highly qualified professionals, led by Juan PÃ©rez, an expert with over 20 years of experience in the construction industry.

Juan is a recognized specialist in thermal insulation with polyurethane foam and waterproofing with polyurea. His deep knowledge encompasses various international brands of machinery and products used in this field.

In addition to his technical expertise, Juan has led numerous construction projects and possesses solid skills in work management, ensuring that each project is completed to the highest quality standards.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide the highest quality thermal insulation and waterproofing solutions, contributing to the energy efficiency and sustainability of buildings in Barcelona and surrounding areas.

about.quote: Each project is unique and requires customized solutions to achieve optimal results.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.subtitle: Discover some of our most recent work in Barcelona and surrounding areas. Each project reflects our dedication to excellence and customer satisfaction.

facadeInsulation.title: Facade Insulation
facadeInsulation.description: Thermal insulation of facade with polyurethane foam to improve the energy efficiency of the building.

terraceWaterproofing.title: Terrace Waterproofing
terraceWaterproofing.description: Waterproofing of terrace with polyurea to prevent leaks and moisture.

industrialInsulation.title: Industrial Warehouse Insulation
industrialInsulation.description: Thermal insulation of industrial warehouse to maintain constant temperature and reduce energy costs.

roofWaterproofing.title: Roof Waterproofing
roofWaterproofing.description: Waterproofing of commercial building roof with polyurea to ensure watertightness.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to help you with your thermal insulation and waterproofing projects. Fill out the form or use the contact information below to get in touch with us.

footer.description: Specialists in thermal insulation with polyurethane foam and waterproofing with polyurea in Barcelona.
